SnipeIT.ToolTip: Configuration for the Snipe-IT asset management integration.

ApiUrl.ToolTip: The base URL for the Snipe-IT API.

ApiKey.ToolTip: The API key for authenticating with Snipe-IT.

PopupWindow.ToolTip: Controls the visibility of different info panels in the main popup window.

ShowRiskScore.ToolTip: Show the security risk score panel.

QuickShortcuts.ToolTip: Configuration for the quick shortcut buttons displayed in the UI.

ReminderOverlay.ToolTip: Configuration for the restart reminder overlay, including triggers and messaging.

Glyph.ToolTip: The icon to display in the reminder overlay.

Enabled.ToolTip: Globally enables or disables the restart reminder feature.

UptimeThreshold.ToolTip: The system uptime, in minutes, that will trigger the reminder.

DeferralDuration.ToolTip: How long, in minutes, to hide the reminder when a user defers.

MaxDeferrals.ToolTip: The maximum number of times a user can defer the restart reminder.

Title.ToolTip: The main title text of the reminder window.

ReminderOverlay.Title: Restart Required

NormalMessage.ToolTip: The message shown for a standard restart reminder.

ReminderOverlay.NormalMessage: Your computer has been running for a long time without a restart. To ensure system stability and apply updates, please restart your machine.

AggressiveMessage.ToolTip: The message shown when the user has reached the maximum number of deferrals.

ReminderOverlay.AggressiveMessage: You have reached the maximum number of deferrals. Please restart your computer now to apply critical updates and maintain system stability.

PrimaryButtonText.ToolTip: The text for the primary action button.

DeferralButtonText.ToolTip: The text for the secondary action button.
